name: TerraTech(working title)
description:
TerraTech (working title) is still in Pre Alpha stage, I am uploading it so I get feedback of people playing/testing it. That's my main focus for now while game is still in development. I would most welcome feedbacks of players so I could work/fix further, as well as desktop/laptop configurations this game is played/tested on. Because of optimization issues.... I work alone on this game so I don't have any other machine to test it on except the one I am working on... thank you in advance... Of course screenshots and gameplay video are welcome as well, I will be adding them to the game page if provided...

Keyboard:

-W or Up arrow = Up
-S or Down arrow = Down
-A or Left arrow = Left
-D or Right arrow = Right

-Left or Right CTRL = Primary fire
-Space bar = Secondary fire
-Left or Right ALT = Special fire

Gamepad:

-Left analog = Movement
-X or Face bottom button = Primary fire
-O or Face right button = Secondary fire
-Square or Face left button = Special fire

Pick ups:
-B = Bonus score
-H = Health
-L = Extra life
-P = Weapon power up
-S = Shield (doesn't work at the moment)
-W = Special weapon (fire)
